bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Requirements for Capacitor Switches for AC Systems (1 kV to 38 kV)
IEEE Standard Requirements for Capacitor Switches for AC Systems (1 kV to 38 kV)
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C37.66-2005 (Revision of ANSI C37.66-1969)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Required definitions, ratings, and procedures for performing design tests, production tests, and construction requirements for capacitor switches for ac systems from 1 kV to 38 kV are covered.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
